scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a presentation of the Christ Child, held by an elderly man wearing a jeweled headdress and a blue robe. The child, with a golden halo, is presented on a richly decorated bed or altar. To the left, a woman in a red gown and green hat holds a small basket and a staff. To the right, a man in a brown robe gestures towards the child, while a woman in a blue mantle kneels with her hands clasped in prayer. The background features arched windows with tracery, set within a structure with vaulted ceilings. The floor is tiled in a green and white checkered pattern. The overall scene is framed by an architectural arch decorated with floral motifs.
